   - Holds a tall golden staff/scepter raised in authority

prediction.extra_explanation: While several other paintings also depicted power strongly (rated 9/10), including 'The Oath of the Horatii', 'The Lictors Bring to Brutus the Bodies of His Sons', 'Portrait of Eleanor of Austria', and various religious works depicting ecclesiastical authority, Napoleon I on his Imperial Throne and Jupiter and Thetis were selected as the two MOST clear depictions because they combine the greatest number of traditional power symbols with the most unambiguous visual language of authority.
